items.sentence: Have you ever eaten anything that Tom\'s cooked?
I wouldn\'t be calling if it weren\'t important.
Everybody knew that Tom could speak French well.
Everybody looks surprised and a little confused.
Everyone in the room was snoring except for Tom.
Everyone was really impressed with that machine.
What\'s your opinion with regard to this matter?
When Tom left, I told him he\'d be back someday.
Mary\'s not pretty, but she isn\'t ugly, either.
I suppose you want me to tell Tom what happened.
